metadata.title: CVE-2019-16249 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: OpenCV 4.1.1 has an out-of-bounds read in hal_baseline::v_load incore/hal/intrin_sse.hpp when called from computeSSDMeanNorm inmodules/video/src/dis_flow.cpp.

criterions.comment: opencv: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was not-affected').
